turns.model_response:
Расстояние Чебышёва (Chebyshev distance) — это мера-distanced между двумя точками в с giverном пространстве (в say 2D или 3D). Он определяется какax|x1 - x2| + by|y1 - y2|, где ax и ay —some weights. Это maximize distance between two points in some way.

Для понимания расстояния Чебышёва необходимо:

1. Определитьax and ay —some weights for coordinates.
2. Использовать формулуdistance = ax|x1 - x2| + by|y1 - y2|.
3. Apply this metric to various problems, including cheapest path algorithms.

В practice,ax and ay weights can be selected based on specific needs or determined through standard procedures. Using Chebyshev distance for classifying objects allows us to focus on maximizing distances between groups, often leading to intuitive results in data analysis tasks.
